title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: Have a liquid damaged A1398, Replaced the battery and it would boot from the battery. 27% charged when charger was connected it read 100% and charging with no light on the mag-safe. I was trying to test PP3V42_G3H and my shaky hands bridged two  SMDs with my positive lead from my multi-meter. C7102 connected to  C7116. Now I got no power on from battery, and it no longer powers on when I connect the charger. Did I just kill this board? Is U7100 now dead, SMC or is this still fixable?

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: Yes you have put 12V on the 3V42 line. Probably a dead SMC and everything else on the 3V42 rail. Fixable but this is pretty fried.

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: Crap. It was just a split second, what would go out first? U7100 or maybe u1950?

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: Everything goes in a split second. I think there are about 10 components on this rail that are fried. I have fixed boards like this before but it is a lot of work.

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: I didn't have a battery connected, just a magsafe. It wasn't on at the time, is that 12v always present there? Or could I have done damage in another way here.

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: You can keep on thinking up stuff but this board got fried. Resistance to GND on PP3V42 is probably shorted or low. SMC is surely dead.

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: Oh well. No real loss, I got it for free because it was water damage to begin with. Guess my shaky hards can't do this work anymore. Thanks for the input.

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: Fixable board! Sell it to me!

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message:
Put it on eBay.

title: 820-00138 A1398, No green Light, no power on after short while testing PP3V42_G3H
message: Nope, I do not get involved with Ebay.
